long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Shopfront is your all-in-one tool to sell products on multiple marketplaces, so you can spend less time listing and give yourself a higher chance at a sale. Simply upload your imagery and use Shopfront to remove/edit the background, generate tagging and listing details and list your product across multiple marketplaces that you’re set up with.

If you’re no longer wanting to spend up to 20 minutes per listing per marketplace, Shopfront can cut that time by up to 90% in a few clicks. 

With Shopfront, you’ll be able to manage products listed by easily delisting automatically if it’s sold on a platform such as Depop, Grailed, Facebook or Ebay. We’ll also be able to share your order information so you can keep track of your tasks from one place.

Shopfront uses this Chrome Extension to connect your marketplace accounts as part of your onboarding process. Once connected you can sign in from anywhere and list your products.
